#### Documentation
##### Help
The full list of all available functions and datasets can be accessed by typing
``` {r helptext, message=FALSE, warnings=FALSE, echo=FALSE, prompt = FALSE, comment = ""} 
helptext <- paste0('help(package = "', NVIpkg, '")')
cat(helptext, sep="", fill = TRUE)
```

##### Vignettes

Consult the vignettes for task-oriented help.
``` {r vignettetext, message=FALSE, warnings=FALSE, echo = FALSE, prompt = FALSE, comment = ""} 
vignettetext <- paste0('vignette(package = "', NVIpkg, '")')
cat(vignettetext, sep="", fill = TRUE)
```

`r if (length(vignette(package = NVIpkg)$result) > 0) {paste0("Vignettes in package ", NVIpkg_inline, ":")}`
```{r vignettes, echo = FALSE}
pkg_vignettes <- vignette(package = NVIpkg)
if (length(pkg_vignettes$result[,"Item"]) > 0) {
  if (length(pkg_vignettes$result[,"Item"]) == 1) {
    pkg_vignettes <- t(as.data.frame(pkg_vignettes$results[, c("Item", "Title")]))
  } else {
    pkg_vignettes <- as.data.frame(pkg_vignettes$results[, c("Item", "Title")])
  }
  rownames(pkg_vignettes) <- NULL
  knitr::kable(x = pkg_vignettes)
}
```
